messages.message:
A few questions for our work at SC today. =


• Is it possible to put a fetcher BEFORE classifier in Metaflow?
• Is it possible to access OpenCV inside of app-tasks / UDFs & Fetchers?
I think opencv is already present — bill of lading use case made a use of it.
We can use OpenCV in our UDFs
@dlluncor another question.. UDF can’t have 1:N semantics right? Eg we can’t use a UDF to process a video and spit out images before a ocr step
Currently no 1:N semantics. Are you asking about Process Files UDF FYI? I think @Jonathan Shih had a hook for it — but not sure if it ended up working to split one image into many
Theoretically it works. Never been tested haha
